poem_en: Carl was congested. Normally, not such a bad thing, but he didn’t just have a heart, he was one. While some try, he lived his whole life with it, not just on his sleeve. It was terminal, you see. He missed a flight, she was on it. There was no catching up, skipped a beat without him even noticing.
poem_it: Carl era intasato. Normalmente, non così terribile, ma lui non aveva solo un cuore, lui ne era uno. Mentre alcuni cercano, lui ha vissuto tutta la sua vita con esso, non solo sulle spalle. Era terminale, capisci. Ha perso un volo, lei era su di esso. Non c'era modo di recuperare il tempo perso, ha saltato un battito senza nemmeno accorgersene.
